revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Apu1c1.jpg |image1_size = 300px |caption = Single Board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.pcengines.ch/apu1d.htm |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = PC-Engines_apu.1d |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = PC-Engines |model = APU1 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = D |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 2017/08/09 |page_start_origon = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/pcengines/pcengines_apu1d |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = Router Firewall |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = AMD;T40E;GET40E;GET40EFSB22GV; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = X86 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L1606EM2I-12G; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SD Card |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash2size = 8 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash3type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G83AFR-PBC; |ram1_num = 8 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8111E; |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8111E; |eth3chip = Realtek;RTL8111E; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Coreboot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Mini PCIe, mSATA, SATA, SIM Card slot, SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = 1 |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console (DE-9),, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 16-pin header,, unpopulated,, J13
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, SIM Card slot, SD Card slot, UART, I2C, GPIO, buzzer, heatsink, metal case |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt, pfSense, IPFire
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/2014 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Switzerland
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[AMD]] G series T40E @1.0GHz Dual-core 64bit X86 *Storage: 2MB SPI Flash, 8GB SD Card, mSATA, SATA *Memory: 2GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 3x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 host port *PCI: 2x Mini PCIe slots *Power: 12V, 2A via barrel
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = x86_64 version :write image via physdiskwrite to SD-card or m-SATA
Please insert instructions here
===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/pcengines/pcengines_apu1d |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/pcengines/apu |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = x86 |subtarget = 64 |arch = x86_64 |support_started_version = 17.01.2 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
